## kl wg disconnect

disconnect selected device wireguard

### Synopsis

disconnect wireguard
Examples:
  # disconnect the selected device
  kl wg disconnect

  # disconnect the selected device with verbose
  kl wg disconnect -v

```
kl wg disconnect [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help      help for disconnect
  -v, --verbose   show verbose
```
